item.title: Installing SRM VNXe SRA – Failed to load SRA, ‘queryInfo’ didn’t return a response
item.description: Quick post to cover a fix for installing the VNXe SRA when you encounter the below error: Failed to load SRA from ‘C:/Program Files/VMware/VMware vCenter Site Recovery Manager/storage/sra/EMC VNXe SRA’. SRA command ‘queryInfo’ didn’t return a response. The components installed (in this order) are: vSphere 5.5 SRM 5.5 UNISphere CLI 1.5.4.1.0027-1 VNXe SRA 5.0.0 The root cause is that the system locale is EN-GB rather than EN-US, however even changing the locale does not resolve the issue.
